bug.author: eric-haibin-lin
bug.summary: Failed dist_sync_kvstore test not detected on CI for a long time
bug.description:
e.g. <denchmark-link:http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/incubator-mxnet/detail/PR-11001/9/pipeline/1442>http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/incubator-mxnet/detail/PR-11001/9/pipeline/1442</denchmark-link>
The test fails but CI didn't detect that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rahul003>@rahul003</denchmark-link>
It seems to fail after <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/10645>#10645</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/haojin2>@haojin2</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/eric-haibin-lin>@eric-haibin-lin</denchmark-link> is this good to be closed now? Seems like the test is fixed now.
